tasks.label: Run JPEG test application
tasks.command: poetry install --no-interaction --no-ansi > /dev/null && export $(cat .env | xargs) && poetry run c2pie sign --input_file ${TEST_IMAGE_PATH}

tasks.label: Run PDF test application
tasks.command: poetry install --no-interaction --no-ansi > /dev/null && export $(cat .env | xargs) && poetry run c2pie sign --input_file ${TEST_PDF_PATH}

tasks.label: Build package
tasks.command: rm -rf dist && rm -rf build && poetry build

tasks.label: Lint and Format
tasks.command: poetry install --no-interaction --no-ansi > /dev/null && poetry run ruff format . && poetry run ruff check --fix .
